data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Lampung do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lampung, Indonesia

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Lampung.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Lampung
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Lampung, Indonesia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, I pray that the Aji people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Aji people know you.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Lampung.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: the state of Lampung has (about) 154,556 people who know Jesus, 388,291 people who know about him culturally, and 4,274,353 people who are far from Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Lampung, Indonesia has a population of 4,817,200.

We estimate Lampung has 154,556 people who might know Jesus, 388,291 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,274,353 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 31 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Lampung access to a Bible in their own language.
